projects.title: Smart IoT Sensor Network
projects.description: A comprehensive IoT system for environmental monitoring using embedded sensors, real-time data processing, and cloud integration. Features include temperature, humidity, and air quality monitoring with automated alerts.

projects.title: FPGA Image Processor
projects.description: High-performance image processing system implemented on FPGA for real-time computer vision applications. Supports multiple image filters, edge detection, and object recognition algorithms.

projects.title: Autonomous Robot Navigation
projects.description: Advanced autonomous navigation system for mobile robots using SLAM algorithms and sensor fusion. Implements path planning, obstacle avoidance, and localization in dynamic environments.

projects.title: PCB Design Tool
projects.description: Custom PCB design automation tool with advanced routing algorithms and component placement optimization. Features include design rule checking and automated manufacturing file generation.

projects.title: ML Accelerator Chip
projects.description: Custom machine learning accelerator chip designed for edge computing applications. Optimized for neural network inference with low power consumption and high throughput.

projects.title: Signal Processing Library
projects.description: Comprehensive digital signal processing library with optimized algorithms for audio, image, and sensor data processing. Includes FFT, filtering, and spectral analysis functions.
